name: Design island!
description:
Welcome to your very own island estate! Magically renovate your luxury villa and begin a fantasy adventure - beat match-3 levels to unlock new rooms, mansion, garden and furniture! Start your journey, meet new friends, help the islanders, and create the vacation paradise of your dreams! Let your design skills shine and make your home and dream island world-famous!
Game features:
- Original Makeover Gameplay: Complete story missions for entertainment and build your luxury island villa!
- Plan Your Design: Renovate and decorate all-new rooms and decorating: flower shop, kitchen, candy… you're the designer!
- Exciting match-3 levels: Hundreds of match-3 levels and unique boosters for you to crush!
- 3D World: High-quality art in full 3D!
- Cute Pets: Adorable animals join you on your journey - need we say more?
- Play now: Enjoy Design Island anywhere, even without internet!
Design Island is a free-to-play puzzle game with purchasable items. To turn off the payment feature, disable in-app purchases in Settings.
Please contact us at designislandgame@gmail.com with any problems or suggestions - we'd love to hear from you!
